Goal/Purpose of this Project

The end goal is to make a yahtzee advisor to the player to give the best advice on what they should do in order to have the highest chance of winning. Examples of advice the program will give is to tell the user what dice to reroll or what they should go for.
source.58f1a7a2:
What is Yahtzee?

Yahtzee is a game that combines both chance and startegy for the goal to get the most points through certain dice combinations. Specific game descriptions can be found here: http://www.yahtzee.org.uk/rules.html
